learning_objectives.description: Recognise, describe and draw the following transformations: Reflection of a shape in a vertical or horizontal line.
Recognise, describe and draw the following transformations: Rotation of a shape about the origin, vertices or midpoints of edges of the shape, through multiples of 90Â°.
Recognise, describe and draw the following transformations: Enlargement of a shape from a centre by a scale factor.
Recognise, describe and draw the following transformations: Translation of a shape by a vector (x y).

subtopic.notes_and_examples:
Questions will not involve combinations of transformations. A ruler must be used for all straight edges.
Positive and fractional scale factors only.
